    Function reference

    All functions

    absoluteRiskReduction()
    Absolute risk reduction
    computeCovariateBalance()
    Compute covariate balance
    computeIncidence()
    Compute incidence
    computeIncidenceOverall()
    Compute risk stratified incidence
    computeRseeCovariateBalance()
    Compute risk stratified covariate balance
    computeRseeIncidence()
    Compute risk stratified incidence for all analyses
    createAnalysisSettings()
    Create a parameter defining the performed risk stratified analysis
    createCreateIPWArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function createIPW Create an object defining the parameter values.
    createCreatePsArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function createPs
    createDatabaseSettings()
    Create parameter object for database to be reached
    createGetCmDataArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function getDbCohortMethodData
    createGetCovariateSettings()
    Create the parameter object for extracting the covariates Contains the arguments for the extraction of both the covariates related to the prediction step and the estimation step.
    createGetDataSettings()
    Create parameter object for extracting the data
    createGetPlpDataArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function getPlpData
    createIPW()
    Creates Inverse Probability Weights
    createMatchOnPsArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function matchOnPs
    createOverallResults()
    Combines the overall results
    createPopulationSettings()
    Create parameter object for defining the analysis populations Contains the settings for defining both the populationPlp and the populationCm objects.
    createRunCmAnalysesArgs()
    Create a parameter object for defining the estimation analyses.
    createRunCmSettingsArgs()
    Create a parameter object for running the estimation step
    createRunExistingPlpSettingsArgs()
    Create prediction settings for an existing model
    createRunPlpAnalysesArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function runPlp
    createRunPlpSettingsArgs()
    Create run settings for prediction
    createRunSettings()
    Create a settings object for running the analyses Create the settings for running the analyses. The input consists of two parts: 1) the settings for running the prediction algorithms and 2) the settings for estimating treatment effects within strata of predicted risk.
    createStratifyByPsArgs()
    Create a parameter object for the function stratifyByPs
    estimateTreatmentEffect()
    Estimate treatment effects within risk strata
    fitOutcomeModels()
    Fit outcome models
    fitOutcomeModelsOverall()
    Fit overall outcome model
    fitPsModel()
    Calculate propensity scores for a specific outcome
    fitPsModelOverall()
    Calculate propensity scores for a specific outcome
    fitPsModelSwitch()
    Fits switched propensity score models
    outcomeModelWeighted()
    Fits a weighted cox regression model
    prepareForPlpData()
    Prepares for the running the PatientLevelPrediction package
    prepareMultipleRseeViewer()
    Prepare shiny viewer
    relativeRiskReduction()
    Relative risk reduction
    rseeViewer()
    Risk stratified effect estimation viewer
    runRiskStratifiedEstimation()
    Runs a risk stratified analysis
    stratifiedKaplanMeier()
    Calculate stratified Kaplan-Meier estimates
